transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan, mai, hello, haan ji sir, haan ji sir.
Executive: Haan, woh actually ek cheez puchna tha, usme mai lead vagera mai dekh raha tha ki paas likha hua hai ek jagah.
Executive: Company ka naam batayenge sir ek baar, kaunsi company se baat kar rahe hai?
Customer: Paas, paas, aapke jo menu hai na, menu ke isme hi paas likha hua hai jaise tenders, buyleads, recent ye sab hai na.
Executive: Haan, haan, ji, ji.
Customer: Haan, usme paas bhi likha hua hai toh usme I am interested click karte hai toh use hote hai, consume hote hai kya?
Executive: Tenders pe?
Customer: Are.
Executive: Haan, nahi sir, mai wohi keh raha hu, aap tender consume karte hai na, usme uski baat kar rahe hai na aap?
Customer: Nahi, nahi, nahi, nahi, tender toh koi baat nahi kar raha.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Meri, meri page pe aane ke baad, side se scroll karte hai na upar ki line, relevant, recent, catalog, related, tenders, tenders ke baad me paas bhi hai.
Customer: Paas leads.
Executive: Haan, haan, paas leads, ji, ji, ji.
Customer: Toh usme jo sold out dikhte hai woh sab consume hai woh?
Executive: Haan, ji.
Customer: Yeh sold out hai na?
Executive: Haan, yeh sold out rehti hai, kuch-kuch sold out rehti hai, kuch-kuch nahi rehti hai usme.
Customer: Paas leads matlab kaise kya?
Customer: Toh isme I am interested karte hai toh kya hota hai?
Executive: I am interested karte hai toh matlab usse related leads aati hai fir aapke paas.
Customer: Toh fir yeh consume nahi hoti na buyleads?
Executive: Ek baar check karna padega, ek baar aap, ek minute haan sir, ek minute.
Executive: Shree Sunil hai na aapka, ek minute. 400, ek minute sir hold kijiye.
Executive: Ek minute sir haan, mai check kar raha hu.
Executive: Hold kijiye sir, ek minute haan, mai abhi ek call pe hu, ek minute.
Customer: Kya bol rahe ho?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan, boliye.
Executive: Haan, ji, ji sir, usme aapke paas jo paas leads me aati hai na, matlab woh purani leads hai aapki, woh consume ho chuki hai aapki, usse related leads aane lag jaati hai aapke paas.
Customer: Toh usse buyleads consume nahi hoti na, I am interested click karne pe?
Executive: Nahi, nahi, haan, nahi, nahi, usse buyleads consume nahi hoti, kyuki woh already consume hote hai, usse related, haan, usse related leads aati hai.
Customer: Mujhe, mujhe samajh me aa gaya, I am interested ke baad woh wohi hoga ki vaise-vaise leads dikhayega.
Executive: Accha, ji, ji.
Executive: Haan, baki usme aapne woh toh kar liya hai na, aapke products ka sara ho gaya tha aapka usme?
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Matlab aapke jo, jisne mere, mere paas sir ka dobara call aaya tha na, aapke bete ka, woh aapko uske liye bata rahe the.
Customer: Nahi, nahi, mai toh unka beta hi baat kar raha hu, unka call aaya.
Executive: Accha, sorry sir, maine socha aapke father ka call aaya, sorry sir. Woh actually, haan, woh, haan, maine socha aapke father ka call aaya, woh kyuki aapki complaint open ho rakhi hai na toh hamare paas aapka number nahi aata usme.
Executive: Ji, ji, ji, toh aapka number show nahi ho raha tha, mere se khali company ka naam aa raha tha aapka, toh maine socha aapke father ka call aaya.
Customer: Samjha ji, actually woh.
Executive: Accha, ji, ji.
Executive: Baki toh kuch issue nahi aa raha na sir abhi, woh khali usi ke bare me pata karna tha aapko?
Customer: Haan, aur kuch nahi issue.
Executive: Haan, thik hai sir, baki kuch issue hota hai toh aapke paas mera number hai hi, mujhe contact kar lijiyega iske bare me.
Executive: Aur yeh leads consume kar rahe hai aap daily basis pe, ek minute haan, sir aapki leads bhi check kar leta hu.
Customer: Leads toh consume kar rahe hai bhaiya par abhi aisa jaise matlab, aapka koi conversion baat vagera hoti hai par unka jo requirement hota hai, woh baat karte hai bolte hai fir se call back hi nahi aata unka, fir hum bhi call karte hai toh woh bolte hai ki ek do ek do din se bolte hai ho gaya lead consume, hamara order complete ho gaya bolte hai.
Executive: Nahi, nahi sir, thik hai, abhi just 15 minute pehle aapke ek lead aayi hai, 45 GSM brown micro fiber bathroom towel hai.
Customer: Hmm, ji, ji.
Executive: Aur yeh 30 aapki 250 piece ka order hai, 60, 50 piece ka order hai, 3000 se 10000.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Consume kar sakte hai na?
Executive: Haan, ji, toh wohi sab cheeze hai, aapke aapke product se related hi aa rahi hai aapki.
Executive: Haan, baki yeh hai ki paas me jaake ek baar check kar lijiye, usme yeh rehta hai agar aap I am interested karte hai toh us product se related kyuki kabhi kabhar aisa hota hai ki aapke kuch products me aapki category alag ho jaati hai, toh us wajah se nahi aati hai, toh isliye hum usme paas lead ka bhi option dete hai.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Thik hai bolo, haan ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Toh yahi sab cheeze hai, thik hai sir.
Customer: Okay, baki kuch issue hota hai toh call kar lijiyega.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquired about the 'pass leads' section.

- Whether leads are consumed after clicking 'I am interested'.

- Leads not converting into orders.



Resolution:

- Explained 'pass leads' are older, consumed leads.

- Clicking 'I am interested' shows related leads.

- Advised to check 'pass' section for category issues.

- Informed about a recent lead for bathroom towels.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to contact if any further issues.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, pass leads, i am interested, lead conversion
